create_pattern_schematics.contraption_ap: Couldn't apply schematic: Schematic not positioned!
create_pattern_schematics.schematic.tool: Select and use [CTRL]-Scroll to clone in the current facing direction.
Alternatively, [CTRL+SHIFT]-Scroll to clone on the selected surface.
item.create_pattern_schematics.empty_pat: Can be written to make an _extended version of Create's schematic_ which allows contraptions and schematicannons to _repeat a design_ multiple times.
item.create_pattern_schematics.pattern_s: An _extended version of Create's schematic_ which allows contraptions and schematicannons to _repeat a design_ multiple times.
